Bio

Related

Stats

Biography

FMU: First-year player at FMU.....Transfer from Garrett College, where he played one season....Also attended Richard Bland College in Virginia, where he played his freshman year.....A seasoned college player who can do a variety of things well on the court.....Capable shooter, rebounder, and defender....Will play multiple positions for the Patriots.

GC: Averaged 12.3 points, 5.7 rebounds, and 2.6 assists per game during 2021-22 season....Played in all 28 games, shot 47.2 percent from the floor (including 39.9 percent from behind the three-point arc), and helped lead the Lakers to an 18-11 overall record and the Western Pennsylvania Collegiate Conference (Division II) Tournament championship.....Earned WPCC All-Conference honors and NJCAA All-Region 20 honorable mention recognition.

RBC: Averaged 9.5 points, 3.5 rebounds, and 1.7 assists per game as a freshman for the Statesmen in 24 games.

PERSONAL:

Born Darius E. Jones in Richmond, VA

Graduate of Hermitage High School, where he played for coach Brian Henderson

First attended Varina High School, where he played for coach Andrew Lacey, and helped lead that squad to the 2018 Class 5 State Championship and a 26-2 record

Played AAU basketball with VA Havoc 17U.

Nicknames are Dmoney or D

PERSONAL FAVORITES:

As a child what you wanted to be when you grew up: NBA player

How you got your nickname: I love money so people around me called me Dmoney

Favorite Superhero: Spider-Man

Favorite Athlete: Lebron James

Favorite Sports Teams: Dallas Cowboys and Los Angeles Lakers

Favorite Movie or TV Show: Coach Carter

Favorite Food: Alfredo or tacos

Favorite Vacation Spot: Hawaii

Favorite Musical Artist: Lil Durk

Favorite Off-Field/court Activity: Playing video games or going out

Goals for Upcoming Season: Get a 3.0 or higher GPA, be one of the best players in the conference

Why you first chose your sport: I loved this sport and also my dad loved it

Biggest mental challenge in your sport: Keeping a positive attitude

Interesting Notes: My father passed when I were still inside my mom, he plays a big part in everything I do
